item.title: Blocked ditch opposite Number 38 Greenway Lane Charlton Kings Cheltenham, 31st March
item.description:
The ditch that runs alone side Greenway Lane Charlton Kings Cheltenham is becomming blocked and overgrown as this area has been a problem flooding are in the past please can someone look into having it cleared i case of further flooding
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 36 Greenway Lane, Charlton Kings

item.title: The side of the road has been broken away and there is a deep drainage area in the field which a vehicle could easily drive off the road into., 30th March
item.description:
There is a drainage system which should carry the heavy flow of water from the hills above and many springs off the road surface and through a field boundary. The Tarmac has been washed away and there is a deep gulley, open ditch and drain on the side of the road. Mill Lane is narrow but gets very busy and is barely capable of allowing two cars to pass each other. With no warning of the danger and in the dusk or dark there is a serious accident waiting to happen.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Castle Dream Stud Mill Lane, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fltipped Material + Burnt Flytip, 29th March
item.description:
The location is again the Old Quarry entrance off Cleeve Common Road and boith sides of the entrance wall. A fire was set there and now consists of burnt metal together with a fire extinguisher body. On the road side of the entrance wall - the area is littered with rubbish and pieces of board. Please can it all be thoroughly cleared up as it is an AONB footpath

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Food waste all over the road, 29th March
item.description:
Man throwing bread and food waste all.over the road. Nothing done after 3rd time of reporting as far as I'm aware. This is attracting rats.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 39 Humber Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
